column3:
Milestone 1 - Work Package 2025 Foundational Research Mid-Year Report
Deliverables: Mid-year report showcasing the completed foundational research outputs.

Milestone 2 - Work Package 2025 Technology Validation Mid-Year Report
Deliverables: Mid-year report showcasing the completed technology validation outputs.

Milestone 3 - Work Package 2025 Foundational Research End-Year Report
Deliverables: End-year report showcasing 20 foundational research outputs (streams rolling into 2026 will be highlighted with supporting explanations)

Milestone 4 - Work Package 2025 Technology Validation End-Year Report
Deliverables: End-year report showcasing 6 technology validation outputs (streams rolling into 2026 will be highlighted with supporting explanations)
